capabilities.name: expandSchema
capabilities.description: Expand the input schema for a tool before calling the tool

capabilities.name: refreshentity
capabilities.description: Refresh the entity related to entityRef.

capabilities.name: getentities
capabilities.description: Get all entities matching a given filter.

capabilities.name: getentitybyuid
capabilities.description: Get a single entity by the UID.

capabilities.name: deleteentitybyuid
capabilities.description: Delete a single entity by UID.

capabilities.name: getentitybyname
capabilities.description: Get an entity by an entity ref.

capabilities.name: getentityancestrybyname
capabilities.description: Get an entity's ancestry by entity ref.

capabilities.name: getentitiesbyrefs
capabilities.description: Get a batch set of entities given an array of entityRefs.

capabilities.name: getentitiesbyquery
capabilities.description: Search for entities by a given query.

capabilities.name: getentityfacets
capabilities.description: Get all entity facets that match the given filters.

capabilities.name: createlocation
capabilities.description: Create a location for a given target.

capabilities.name: validateentity
capabilities.description: Validate that a passed in entity has no errors in schema.
